Package restaurant

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Desert
    Desert implementation.
    FullMeal
    FullMeal is an extension to the Meal class.
    HalfMeal
    HalfMeal is one type of meal, it extends the abstract Meal Class.
    ItemFactory
    ItemFactory is part of the FactoryPattern to create items.
    ItemFactoryProducer  
    MainDish
    Main Dish is a type of SingleItem and extends the class SingleItem.
    Meal
    Meal is the superClass of every possible combination of items, that are supposed to be a kind of meal (i.e.
    MealFactory
    MealFactory is part of the abstract factory pattern to add items to the menu.
    Menu
    The class provides the listing of singleItems and Meals that one Restaurant offers.
    SingleItem
    SingleItem provides information about the price, the type, the name and the id of singleItem.
    SingleItemFactory
    SingleItemFactory is part of the abstract factory pattern to add items to the menu.
    Starter
    Starter implementation.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ItemDoesNotExist
    Exception if the user try to access to an item that does not exists.
    WrongItemAdded
    Exception which appears when a user try to add an item to a meal even if it is not possible.
    WrongItemRemoved
    Exception which appears when a user try to remove an item to a meal even if it is not possible.
